Headline: #76 Diversey Temporary Reroute at Diversey/Paulina
ShortDescription: 76 Diversey buses are temporarily rerouted via: Diversey, Ashland, Belmont, Damen, Diversey, due to, street blockage, near Diversey/Paulina.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#76 Diversey buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via: Diversey, Ashland, Belmont, Damen, Diversey, due to, street blockage, near Diversey/Paulina.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem at Damen.  Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem at Damen.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
